snippet: The Republican presidential candidates say President Obama has not done enough to stop Iran from building nuclear weapons, but it is not clear what they would do differently.
abstract: Republican presidential candidates say that President Obama has not done enough to stop Iran from building nuclear weapons, but it is not clear how their own policies, which call for the same sanctions and punitive measures advocated by Obama, would be any different.
lead_paragraph: The Republican presidential candidates say President Obama has not done enough to stop Iran from building nuclear weapons, but it is not clear what they would do differently.

headline.seo: Republican Policies for Iran Differ Little From Obama’s
headline.main: Candidates Hammer Obama Over Iran, but Approaches Differ Little
headline.print_headline: Candidates Hammer Obama Over Iran, but Approaches Differ Little
